reviews.review: Never played this game when it was available for the Xbox 360.I  am beyond happy with the $3 purchase of this Portal game! I liked the story design of the game and found it to be a great way to enjoy an afternoon at home during Quarantine.
cool

This game is a fucking classic, the main campaign is short and sweet and doesn't stick around too long, and the story somehow got me sad over the same robot that had been trying to kill me the whole game.
Not much to say other than the fact the game is basically perfect, its a crime how cheap it is on sale. 10/10
ta locaso, cÃ³mpralo
it is so awesome.

Oye, enserio haz el favor de probar este juego, lo terminaras amando, es algo complicado de vez en cuando, pero completar la historia sera algo que te marcara, al igual que te recomiendo portal 2.

El unico pero que le voy a poner, es que si ya haz jugado te lo pasas algo rapido y recortas tiempo de juego, pero el verdadero problema son los logros, creeme cuando digo que terminar este juego al 100% sin usar guias es algo realmente complicado
Playing this classic game for the first time was everything i expected. Its such a shame they dont make games like this anymore

I avoided this game when it first came out for whenever I got to play it. It is absolutely worth all the hype I knew way back then!
Very pogchamp

3 buckaroos for 2 real good games, real fun experience that doesn't get old. The solutions for multiple puzzles in the game can give you the feeling you did it the wrong way, which is really cleverly designed.

This is a good game. I know I am very late for the party (Portal is around 14 years old by the time of this review) but I still wanna try my best to give a good review for this game.

Portal is a puzzle game that uses some universe bending orbs that basically make you teleport when you go through them, they're called portals (lol). Portal makes other elements to make the simple idea of a portal, funner. They did a very good job in doing so. I enjoyed this game a lot. The main menu is very dark and ominous but most of the game is fun and hilarious. The game also doesn't require that much computer power (that should've been obvious). Thats all I have to say. 

The ending credits song is stuck on my head please help me.

Just finished this for the first time.  A few times I just about rolled with laughter out of my chair.  Having first played some of the Half-Life games, it was so satisfying to be able to just appear in a location on the other end of your room.  It was fun finding creative ways to out-physics your enemies.  A lot of creative puzzles and a great storyline. 8/10. 

P.S. - T.C.I.A.L.

Portal is great game, with a short and sweet main game (took me 2.4 hours) with some very difficult challenges to do afterwards. It took me forever to complete every advanced stage and challenge stage, but was satisfied after doing so. Overall, the game is really good, and fun to play, and holds up incredibly well after all these years. Seriously, how did I get this for only 2 dollars?
